summary: Sneak based Nord Standalone Follower - Available in UUNP, UNPB, SeveNBase, and CBBE
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#1e84cc][size=6][b]Lisya[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[color=#c9daf8][size=2][i]-Something sneaky this way comes-[/i][/size][/color]

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/3x666lxxj/20160920133853_1.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
[size=2]Name:  Lisya
Race:  Nord
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  .97
Weight:  75
Skin:  Leyenda 2K
Body:  Custom HDT UUNP, Base UNPB, Base SeveNBase, or Base CBBE
[i]*SeveNBase Shown in Screenshots*[/i]
Location:  Whiterun - Warmaiden's
Armor:  Skimpy Assassin Armor with increased armor rating
Weapons:  Luna sword with Silver Enchantment; Ebony Bow & Arrows

[i]*UUNP Version Will be Naked; Downloadable UUNP Preset available to build own armor*
[/i]
ENB:  RealVision & Vividian
Tested with AFT & EFF

Class:  Combat Assassin
Style:  Boss One-Handed

Levels with player.  Nord traits/bonuses.
Skill bonuses:  Sneak, Archery, One-Handed
Perks:  Sneak, Archery, One-Handed, Light Armor

[i]*Some users may find her overpowered but when I envision an assassin this is what I see*[/i][/size]

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/co8ln4ruv/20160920133640_1.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]
[size=2]HDT/TBBP Compatible Skeleton such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]

[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/35629995/?tb=mods&pUp=1][img]http://s5.postimg.cc/vn7axqznr/mfeile1974_Link.png[/img]
[/url]-----------------------------------------

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  What is your response to those critics that say follower creators are 'cancer'?
A:  If you're not part of the solution then you're part of the problem.
A:  No one is forcing you to look or download especially when I do this for free.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*

-------------------------------------------

[/font][font=Verdana][color=#1e84cc][size=4]HOT FILES 10/1/2016!!  THANK YOU EVERYONE!!![/size][/color][/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/4gvxnpvk7/LisyaHotFiles.jpg[/img][/center]
author: mfeile1974
